releaseNotes: Added native and impproved iOS and Android mobile apps http://pixelcade.org/apps
Added Playlist feature which allows you to define a slideshow of marquees and widgets and set the duration for each item
Added drag and drop to Playlist and attract mode toggle which prevents the playlist being interrupted when in arcade mode (not on by default
mDNS discovery fix for Linux, tested working on RCade
Moved log to main menu and full screen, much easier to read
Grey out Pixelcade Companion LED components when running in LCD only mode
Added clear and download buttons to Companion log
Improved Pixelcade Companion UI with mobile apps for iOS and Android
Added user system mappings which do not get overwritten
Fixed bug where a Pixelcade LCD was being detected as USB but is not USB connected
The premium art pack will now show if there is an update or have latest version
Added custom artwork uploader in Companion
Added release notes to Updates in Companion for both Pixelcade software and firmware
Bug fix where Pixelcade intermittently hangs on exit
Added flip option for Pixelcade Pulse matrix devices in case the user installed upside down
Add duration option to Pixelcade Companion for Pulse effects
Added no interrupt flag for all the widgets so they can be called in Attract Modes without being interrupted
The pulse zones in the Pixelcade software and firmware sometimes got out of sync, added a one time sync at startup, the pixelcade software is the definitive source
Adding plumbing for front end / Attract mode integration for widgets and playlist, also if LCD is installed, display widgets and playlist on LCD instead
Made scrolling text fonts cleaner, reduced dithering on the top and sides of the scrolling text
Added Word clock, see in Clock widget settings in Companion
7.1.1: Added YouTube Stats widget
7.1.1: Added Pacman, Galaga, Tron, Arkanoid, Tron, Burger Time, Donkey Kong, Space Invaders, Centipede, and Asteroids themed clocks
7.1.1: Support for 8x48 matrices
7.1.2: Playlist Drag Indicator - Visual drop indicator shows exactly where items will be placed when reordering the playlist
7.1.2: Added Spotify widget for music, podcasts, and audiobooks with album art & integration with Pixelcade Pulse devices including metadata displays and LED strip effects
7.1.2: Added Youtube channel stats widget
7.1.2: Added Google Calendar widget
7.1.2: Widget Settings UX Redesign - Widget settings now open as full-screen pages instead of modals for better mobile experience
7.1.5: Cleaned up Spotify one time auth screen
7.1.5: Widget bug fixes, weren't getting interrupted correctly
7.1.5: Fix for bug where Pixelcade intermittently hangs on startup
7.1.5: Visual indicator in Companion home when prod or beta version updates are available
7.1.5: Spotify widget will also send meta data to Pixelcade Pulse 7 segment, WS2812B matrix (center_matrix), and mini LCD sub-displays
7.1.5: Cleaned up logging and checking debug in companion will switch to debug logging without a restart
7.1.5: Added hidden pixelcade.ini key calked skipFirmwareSync which if true will skip the sync of pulse zones to the firmware on startup
7.1.6  Fixed intermittent freeze on startup
7.1.7  Adding last.fm widget
7.2.1  Bug fix for OTA firwmare updates, was failing when LED strip were not enabled
7.2.2  Firmware sync bug fix, missing 8x48 zone definitions
7.2.3  Mapped consoles should now show the original console graphic

7.2.3  Add experimental rom match memory map to handle wheels like favorites, gun games, shmups that have roms across multiple systems, set romLookupFallback = true in pixelcade.ini to try it, it's turned off by default
7.2.3  Added animated arcade themed clocks (pacman, galaga, tron, etc.)
7.2.3  The playlist can accept multiple clock items with different clock types
7.2.3  Music visualizer effects for Pixelcade Pulse devices when using the Spotify and Last.fm widgets
7.2.4  Intermittent freezing fixes
7.2.5  Intermittent freezing fixes continued
7.2.8  Added differential artwork updates so only new or changed artwork is downloaded vs. the whole repo every time
7.2.8  Added a secondary Weather service check in case the first one fails
7.2.8  Added share button for logs on mobile devices (requires version 2.5 of the iOS and Android apps)
7.2.8  Added updater for DOFLinx in game effects core files in the Updates section of Companion
7.2.8  Added DOFLinx help and supported games link to the DOFLinx update section in Companion
7.2.8  Update check is much faster and added animation while checking for updates
7.2.8  Fixed bug with Playlist on dual Pixelcade LED and LCD setups where the LCD playlist was getting mutliple widget calls at the same time
7.2.9  Changed Playlist name to Pixelcade Attract Mode
7.2.9  Added /minilcdonly param to /arcade that will only display on mini LCD sub-displays and skip dot matrix and 7segment displays
7.2.9  Improved font for the Pixelcade Pulse dot matrix display
7.2.9  nointerrupt fix for widgets called from Pixelcade Attract Mode
7.3.0. added progress status during Pixelcade software updates
7.3.0. fixed return code mismatches in /ministats and other handlers that were reporting failing but really succeeding
7.3.1  New Widgets: Plex Now Playing, Yahoo Fantasy, Daily Horoscope, Commute Traffic (using google maps data source), Netflix Top 10, World Clock
7.3.2  Atract mode wasn't being interrupted correctly
7.3.2  Fixed DOFLinx version tracking on Linux & Updated DOFLinx update location for RecalBox
7.3.2  Added widget that simply shows the marquee of the current/last selected game
7.3.3  Made Pixelcade Pulse zone setup more mobile friendly so you can do from your phone while setting up and testing zones, added direction test button too
7.3.3  Added auto backup of pixelcade.ini in the event of corruption, if correctupon is detected upon startup it will restore from backup
7.3.3  Fixed bug where some settings were not gettings saved intermittently
7.3.3  Fixed bug where clock settings were not being applied in Pixelcade Attract Mode
7.3.4  Finds a connected Pixelcade LCD that is connected over USB including auto-detection even if LCD is turned on in settings
7.3.5  Added auto cycle option to the clock widget which will automatically cycle through clock types at a user defined frequency
7.3.5  WIP of visual zone setup for Pixelcade Pulse devices in Companion, not yet complete
7.3.5  When attract mode is stopped, the last game marquee will be re-displayed
7.3.5  Added /text params for no scrolling with 2 lines, 3 lines, or 4 lines along with a blinking option and infinite loop for text scrolling https://pixelcade.org/developers/#text-display-scrolling
7.3.6  Much more user friendly setup for Pixelcase Pulse zones
7.3.6  Bug fix in attract mode where gifs were not playing correclty resulting in some blank screens
7.3.6  Weather widget will load faster
7.3.8  Weather widget units display fix and settings preserved during attract mode
7.3.9  Added zone flood commands
7.4.0  Fixed reboot loop on System ->Reboot from Companion
